data.message: Imagine if all of those people helped one another in some way. Facebook and us could change the world for the better, forever.

replies.message: Well said, Rick! Thanks for stopping by and sharing that beautiful thought. Hope you have a great day! -Sidney
Amen, just do it fb peeps one peep at at time, but all togeter one billion! That's a lot of good. Good deeds, even just a smile can improve a mood, pay it forward.
Facebook You are not getting any phone number out of me. If i wanted you to have my numbers i woul've used one

I know, Sidney. You guys should hire me! ;-)

Can I make a suggestion? Users should be able to add an emoticon, picture, etc, when editing their own post. Sometimes, I forget, like one would with an email attachment, but rather than just editing, I have to start a new post.
